name: IVG
command: echo '{{PASSWORD}}' | su -c 'cd /usr/local/freeswitch/bin/ && ps aux | grep freeswitch && pkill -9 freeswitch && sync && echo 3 > /proc/sys/vm/drop_caches && ./freeswitch'

name: OPS
